New Records: Chris Jordan became the first England player to take a men's T20I hat-trick
Key Match Events: England won the match by 10 wickets with 62 balls remaining
Pre-Game Insights: England used minimal overs to chase down 116 runs
England focused on boosting their net run rate
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler's 83 not out was crucial for England's win
England secured their place in the semi-finals
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's victory improved their net run rate to 1.992
The match was significant for England's tournament progression
